document.masterDocTitle: The genus Colletes (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) in Central Asia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Colletes (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) in Central Asia

subSubSection.paragraph:
Colletes chengtehensis Yasumatsu 1935 : 1
–2, 35– 36 , Plate 1 ( holotype –♂, Jehol, Cheng-teh,
17 .VIII
, China ).

Colletes pallescens Noskiewicz 1936 : 468
–469, ♀, ♂ ( type locality: “Südostrussland (westlich bis Krim), Südsibirien, Mongolei , Ost-Turkestan und Turkestan”).

Colletes tsunekii Yasumatsu 1946
( 1948 ): 19 ( type locality: Mongolia ).

General distribution. Austria , Hungary , Serbia , Romania , Greece , Ukraine , Russia , Georgia , Azerbaijan , Kazakhstan , Uzbekistan , Kyrgyzstan , Turkmenistan , * Tajikistan , Iran , Mongolia , North-eastern China .
